Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.ChartOptions

  • Packages that use ChartOptions 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.commons
    Core classes to manage the inter-operations with java script code.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart
    Contains the default values of chart options based on type of chart instance.

      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client with type parameters of type ChartOptions

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client that return ChartOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) ChartOptions Overrides.chart​(Type type)
      Returns an options instance, to use as default options, based of type of chart.
      private ChartOptions AbstractChart.createChartOptions()
      Creates the chart options based on type of chart.
      It can be override when a controller is implemented.
      private ChartOptions Overrides.createChartOptions​(Type type, IsDefaultScaledOptions defaultOptions)
      Returns an options instance, to use as default options, based of type of chart.
      (package private) ChartOptions AbstractChart.getChartOptions()
      Returns the default chart options
      (package private) ChartOptions Defaults.getChartOptions​(Type type)
      Returns the default options by a chart type, for a existing chart instance.
      It contains:
      global options scale global options chart global options
      ChartOptions Defaults.getOptions​(Type type)
      Returns the default options by a chart type, by defaults of CHART.JS.
      If the type is not consistent, throws an exception.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client with parameters of type ChartOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) List<LegendLabelItem> JsChartHelper.generateDefaultLabels​(Chart chart, ChartOptions options)
      Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box, invoking generateLabels function property.
      (package private) void JsChartHelper.invokeDefaultChartEvent​(ChartOptions options, Key key, Chart context, NativeObject event, ArrayObject items)
      Invokes the chart event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
      (package private) void JsChartHelper.invokeDefaultLegendEvent​(ChartOptions options, Key key, Chart context, NativeObject event, NativeObject item)
      Invokes the legend event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.

    • Uses of ChartOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.commons

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.commons with parameters of type ChartOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private NativeObject Merger.get​(Type type, ChartOptions base)
      Merges chart default options (by chart.defaults[type]), default scale options (by chart.defaults.scale) and global options (by chart.defaults.global).
      The chain of priority is:
      chart default options (by chart.defaults[type]) default scale options (by chart.defaults.scale) global options (by chart.defaults.global)
      private void Merger.handleMultiScalesType​(ChartOptions base, NativeObject chartOptions, NativeObject scaleOptions)
      Manages the merge of options for chart with multiple scales.
      Method parameters in org.pepstock.charba.client.commons with type arguments of type ChartOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Merger.load​(Type type, ChartEnvelop<ChartOptions> options, ChartEnvelop<NativeObject> envelop)
      Merges chart default options (by chart.defaults[type]), default scale options (by chart.defaults.scale) and global options (by chart.defaults.global).
      The chain of priority is:
      chart default options (by chart.defaults[type]) default scale options (by chart.defaults.scale) global options (by chart.defaults.global)

    • Uses of ChartOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart

      Constructors in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.chart with parameters of type ChartOptions 
      Constructor Description
      DefaultChartOptions​(ChartOptions chartOptions)
      Creates the default by a chart options instance, which represents the global options of a chart.
